item:
b_drawer: defines the look of the button that opens the app grid. b_widget: defines the look of the button that opens the widget panel. b_add: defines the look of the button to add widget in the widget screen. b_return: defines the look of the button to return from the widget screen.
catlist_bg: defines the background of the categories list catlist_bg_l: lefthanded version of catlist_bg
cat_selected: defines the background of the selected category cat_selected_l: lefthanded version of cat_selected_l
grid_selector, grid_focused, grid pressed, define the look of the selected icon in the app grid
